text.div:
KIOLAImplementationGuide

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://fhir.ehealth-systems.at/artifacts/ImplementationGuide/kiola-implementation-guide

An Implementation Guide for the KIOLA Profiles.

name: KIOLAImplementationGuide
title: KIOLA Implementation Guide
description: An Implementation Guide for the KIOLA Profiles.

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: Care Plan Subject Identifier Parameter
resource.description: Returns care plans of subjects with a matching identifier

resource.name: Daily medication measurement of Coumadin Definition
Daily medication measurement of Falithrom Definition
Daily medication measurement of Marcumar Definition
Device Definition Specialization System Type Codeable Concept
resource.description: Extension ...

resource.name: KIOLA Automatic Transmission Measurement Device Properties
resource.description: Properties of automatic transmission devices.

resource.name: KIOLA Automatic Transmission Measurement Device Types
resource.description: Types of devices that might automatically transmit vital data measurements to a KIOLA system, without entering the data manually.

resource.name: KIOLA Care Plan
resource.description:
A patient-specific care plan, containing one or multiple instances of different KIOLA standard treatment plans,
that might have been adapted individually for the patient, and/or individually assigned KIOLA activities.

resource.name: KIOLA Care Plan Category Code System
resource.description: Categories of care plans supported by KIOLA.

resource.name: KIOLA Care Plan Management
resource.description: KIOLA care plans might be managed by another system. New and modified plans might be uploaded to the server and the status of existing plans might be changed.

resource.name: KIOLA Care Plan Retrieval
resource.description: The currently active KIOLA Care Plan for a patient might be retrieved by a client, using a search with a fixed set of parameters. The retrieval might be confirmed, by adding a meta tag to the instance. ETags might be used to avoid fetching the same resource twice.

resource.name: KIOLA Care Plan Transient Tag Code System
resource.description: Meta data tags of care plans that should be removed when creating an updated plan for a patient, in case an activity changes.

resource.name: KIOLA Device Codes
resource.description: Generic device types that can transmit vital data.

resource.name: KIOLA Device Codes AIT 11073
resource.description: Measurement device types for automatic transmission of measurements and their configuration parameters, based on the ISO/IEEE 11073 standard with vendor-specific extensions, mainly AIT. The MDC display name is used as a code.

resource.name: KIOLA Devices
resource.description: Devices, that might transmit data to a KIOLA system.

resource.name: KIOLA Dimension Codes AIT 11073
resource.description:
Measurement dimensions supported by KIOLA, based on the ISO/IEEE 11073 standard with vendor-specific extensions, mainly AIT. The MDC display name is used as a code.

All codes might be parametrized using the syntax `CODE:{min=MIN_VAL,max=MAX_VAL}` to define a plausibility range for manual data entry, e.g.: `MDC_DIM_MILLI_G_PER_DL:{min=0,max=1000}`

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Automatic Transmission Device
resource.description: Device supporting automatic transmission of KIOLA vital data measurements, without entering the data manually.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Automatic Transmission Device Definition
resource.description: Definition of a device supporting automatic transmission of KIOLA vital data measurements, without entering the data manually.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Codes
resource.description: Types of vital data measurements that can be transmitted to a KIOLA system. The naming is derived from MDC display names of devices from the ISO/IEEE 11073 standard.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Definition
resource.description: The definition of a vital data measurement for KIOLA.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Device
resource.description: An abstract device for recording a KIOLA vital data measurement.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Device Definition
resource.description: Definition of an abstract device for recording a KIOLA vital data measurement.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Device Types
resource.description: Types of devices that might transmit vital data measurements to a KIOLA system.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Manual Entry Device
resource.description: Device supporting manual data entry of KIOLA vital data measurements.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Manual Entry Device Definition
resource.description: Definition of a device supporting manual data entry of KIOLA vital data measurements.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Request
resource.description: Request to perform a KIOLA vital data measurement.

resource.name: KIOLA Measurement Types
resource.description: Types of vital data measurements, that can be transmitted to a KIOLA system.

resource.name: KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan
resource.description: A standard treatment plan for a set of KIOLA activities. It can be applied to patients as a stand-alone plan or in combination with other plans and might be individualized for a single patient, after applying it.

resource.name: KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Apply
resource.description: Apply a KIOLA standard treatment plan to a patient to generate a treatment plan instance. The current KIOLA care plan of the patient is not taken into account. The standard treatment plan is simply applied to the patient and a new KIOLA care plan containing this treatment plan is returned.

resource.name: KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Code System
resource.description: Meta data tags of standard treatment plans.

resource.name: KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Management
resource.description: KIOLA standard treatment plans might be managed by another system. Existing plans might be queried, new KIOLA standard treatment plans or updated versions of existing plans might be uploaded to the server. Also the status of existing plans might be changed.

resource.name: KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Participant Example
KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Participant Property Example
KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Set Default
resource.description: One or more KIOLA standard treatment plans might be set as default plans, to be preselected when registering a new patient.

resource.name: KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Simple Example
KIOLA Standard Treatment Plan Timing Example
KIOLA Subject UUID
resource.description: Primary identifier for a subject in KIOLA

resource.name: KIOLA Treatment Plan
resource.description: Instance of a KIOLA standard treatment plan, that might have been adapted individually for the patient.

resource.name: KMC App Packages
resource.description: App package IDs of first and 3rd party apps, that might be launched by a mobile client to facilitate the transmission process.

resource.name: KMC Device Codes
resource.description: Various codes that might be used to configure a mobile client.

resource.name: KMC UI References
resource.description: References to UI elements, that might be used to initiate the transmission process on a mobile client.

resource.name: Participant Device Definition
resource.description: Extension to add a device definition to a participant of an activity or plan definition.

resource.name: Plan Definition Patient Instruction
resource.description: Extension to add a patient instruction to the activity of a plan definition.
